verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H7799>Shoshannim,<s%> A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3467>Save<s%> me, O <S%H430>God;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> are come <S%H935>in<s%> <S%H5704>unto<s%> my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

I <S%H2883>sink<s%> in <S%H4688>deep<s%> <S%H3121>mire,<s%> where there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4613>standing:<s%> I am <S%H935>come<s%> into <S%H4615>deep<s%> <S%H4325>waters,<s%> where the <S%H7641>floods<s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me.
I am <S%H3021>weary<s%> of my <S%H7121>crying:<s%> my <S%H1627>throat<s%> is <S%H2787>dried:<s%> mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H3615>fail<s%> while I <S%H3176>wait<s%> for my <S%H430>God.<s%>

They that <S%H8130>hate<s%> me without a <S%H2600>cause<s%> are <S%H7231>more<s%> than the <S%H4480>hairs<s%> <S%H8185><s%> of mine <S%H7218>head:<s%> they that would <S%H6789>destroy<s%> me, being mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H8267>wrongfully,<s%> are <S%H6105>mighty:<s%> <S%H227>then<s%> I <S%H7725>restored<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I took not <S%H3808>away.<s%> <S%H1497><s%>
O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> my <S%H200>foolishness;<s%> and my <S%H819>sins<s%> are <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3582>hid<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> thee.

Let <S%H408>not<s%> them that wait <S%H6960>on<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> for my sake: let <S%H408>not<s%> those that <S%H1245>seek<s%> thee be <S%H3637>confounded<s%> for my sake, O <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Because <S%H3588><s%> for thy <S%H5921>sake<s%> I have <S%H5375>borne<s%> <S%H2781>reproach;<s%> <S%H3639>shame<s%> hath <S%H3680>covered<s%> my <S%H6440>face.<s%>
I am <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H2114>stranger<s%> unto my <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and an <S%H5237>alien<s%> unto my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1121>children.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of thine <S%H1004>house<s%> hath eaten me <S%H398>up;<s%> and the <S%H2781>reproaches<s%> of them that <S%H2778>reproached<s%> thee are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me.
When I <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and chastened my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H6685>fasting,<s%> that <S%H1961>was<s%> to my <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>
I <S%H5414>made<s%> <S%H8242>sackcloth<s%> also my <S%H3830>garment;<s%> and I <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%> to them.
They that <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> <S%H7878>speak<s%> against me; and I was the <S%H5058>song<s%> of the <S%H8354>drunkards.<s%> <S%H7941><s%>

But as for <S%H589>me,<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%> is unto thee, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in an <S%H7522>acceptable<s%> <S%H6256>time:<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me, in the <S%H571>truth<s%> of thy <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> me out of the <S%H4480>mire,<s%> <S%H2916><s%> and let me <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H2883>sink:<s%> let me be <S%H5337>delivered<s%> from them that <S%H4480>hate<s%> <S%H8130><s%> me, and out of the <S%H4480>deep<s%> <S%H4615><s%> <S%H4325>waters.<s%>

Let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H7641>waterflood<s%> <S%H4325><s%> <S%H7857>overflow<s%> me, <S%H408>neither<s%> let the <S%H4688>deep<s%> swallow me <S%H1104>up,<s%> and let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H875>pit<s%> <S%H332>shut<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> me.

Hear <S%H6030><s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> is <S%H2896>good:<s%> <S%H6437>turn<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me according to the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy tender <S%H7356>mercies.<s%>
And <S%H5641>hide<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from thy <S%H4480>servant;<s%> <S%H5650><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I am in <S%H6862>trouble:<s%> <S%H6030>hear<s%> me <S%H4116>speedily.<s%>
Draw <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> my <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and <S%H1350>redeem<s%> it: <S%H6299>deliver<s%> me because <S%H4616>of<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

Thou <S%H859><s%> hast <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H2781>reproach,<s%> and my <S%H1322>shame,<s%> and my <S%H3639>dishonor:<s%> mine <S%H6887>adversaries<s%> are <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> thee.

Reproach <S%H2781><s%> hath <S%H7665>broken<s%> my <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and I am full of <S%H5136>heaviness:<s%> and I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for some to take <S%H5110>pity,<s%> but there was <S%H369>none;<s%> and for <S%H5162>comforters,<s%> but I <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>
They <S%H5414>gave<s%> me also <S%H7219>gall<s%> for my <S%H1267>meat;<s%> and in my <S%H6772>thirst<s%> they gave me <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> to <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
Let their <S%H7979>table<s%> <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H6341>snare<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them: and that which should have been for their <S%H7965>welfare,<s%> let it become a <S%H4170>trap.<s%>
Let their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> that they see <S%H4480>not;<s%> <S%H7200><s%> and make their <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> to <S%H4571>shake.<s%>
Pour <S%H8210>out<s%> thine <S%H2195>indignation<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them, and let thy <S%H2740>wrathful<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> take <S%H5381>hold<s%> of them.
Let their <S%H2918>habitation<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H8074>desolate;<s%> and <S%H1961>let<s%> <S%H408>none<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H168>tents.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H7291>persecute<s%> him <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> hast <S%H5221>smitten;<s%> and they <S%H5608>talk<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> the <S%H4341>grief<s%> of those whom thou hast <S%H2491>wounded.<s%>
Add <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity:<s%> and let them <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> into thy <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Let them be <S%H4229>blotted<s%> out of the <S%H4480>book<s%> <S%H5612><s%> of the <S%H2416>living,<s%> and <S%H408>not<s%> be <S%H3789>written<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
But <S%H589>I<s%> am <S%H6041>poor<s%> and <S%H3510>sorrowful:<s%> let thy <S%H3444>salvation,<s%> O <S%H430>God,<s%> set me up on <S%H7682>high.<s%>
I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> with a <S%H7892>song,<s%> and will <S%H1431>magnify<s%> him with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%>
This also shall <S%H3190>please<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> better than an <S%H4480>ox<s%> <S%H7794><s%> or <S%H6499>bullock<s%> that hath <S%H7160>horns<s%> and <S%H6536>hooves.<s%>
The <S%H6035>humble<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> this, and be <S%H8055>glad:<s%> and your <S%H3824>heart<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%> that <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heareth<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H34>poor,<s%> and <S%H959>despiseth<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> his <S%H615>prisoners.<s%>
Let the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1984>praise<s%> him, the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and every <S%H3605>thing<s%> that <S%H7430>moveth<s%> therein.

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and will <S%H1129>build<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> that they may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and have it in <S%H3423>possession.<s%>
The <S%H2233>seed<s%> also of his <S%H5650>servants<s%> shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it: and they that <S%H157>love<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> therein.
